panels.title: slot table add to exiting fraction

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  sum(rate(ic_consensus_manager_slot_table_new_entry_total{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",client=~"$client"}[$period])) by (ic, replica, ic_subnet, instance),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"
)
